sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const SkinHairCare = () => { const skinCareRecipes = [ { name: 'Turmeric Face Pack', ingredients: ['2 tbsp gram flour (besan)', '1/2 tsp turmeric powder', '2-3 drops rose water', 'Milk/yogurt as needed'], method: 'Mix all ingredients to form a paste. Apply evenly on face and neck. Leave for 15-20 minutes and rinse with lukewarm water.', benefits: 'Anti-inflammatory, brightening, and acne-fighting properties', }, { name: 'Kumkumadi Face Oil', ingredients: ['Saffron', 'Sandalwood powder', 'Rose petals', 'Sesame oil base'], method: 'Traditional preparation involves infusing ingredients in base oil under sunlight for specific duration.', benefits: 'Brightens complexion, reduces pigmentation, and promotes skin radiance', }, ]; const hairCareRecipes = [ { name: 'Kerala Hair Oil Massage', ingredients: ['Coconut oil', 'Curry leaves', 'Fenugreek seeds', 'Amla powder'], method: 'Heat coconut oil with ingredients, strain, and cool. Massage into scalp and leave overnight.', benefits: 'Promotes hair growth, prevents premature graying, strengthens roots', }, { name: 'Hibiscus Hair Mask', ingredients: ['Hibiscus flowers/leaves', 'Yogurt', 'Aloe vera gel', 'Coconut oil'], method: 'Blend ingredients into a smooth paste. Apply from roots to tips, leave for 30 minutes, then wash.', benefits: 'Prevents hair fall, adds shine, promotes growth', }, ]; const harmfulIngredients = [ { name: 'Parabens', found: 'Shampoos, conditioners, lotions', why: 'Hormone disruption, potential link to breast cancer', natural_alternative: 'Tea tree oil, grapefruit seed extract', }, { name: 'Sulfates (SLS/SLES)', found: 'Shampoos, body wash, face cleansers', why: 'Strips natural oils, irritates skin/scalp', natural_alternative: 'Shikakai, soap nut (reetha)', }, { name: 'Phthalates', found: 'Fragranced products, nail polish', why: 'Endocrine disruption, developmental issues', natural_alternative: 'Essential oils, natural fragrances', }, ]; return (

Skin & Hair Care

{/* Natural Remedies Section */}

Kerala Ayurveda Natural Remedies

{/* Skin Care Recipes */}

Skin Care Recipes

{skinCareRecipes.map((recipe, index) => (

{recipe.name}

Ingredients:

    {recipe.ingredients.map((ingredient, i) => (
  • {ingredient}
    • ))}

Method:

{recipe.method}

Benefits:

{recipe.benefits}

))}
{/* Hair Care Recipes */}

Hair Care Recipes

{hairCareRecipes.map((recipe, index) => (

{recipe.name}

Ingredients:

    {recipe.ingredients.map((ingredient, i) => (
  • {ingredient}
    • ))}

Method:

{recipe.method}

Benefits:

{recipe.benefits}

))}
{/* Harmful Chemicals Section */}

Avoiding Harmful Chemicals

{harmfulIngredients.map((ingredient, index) => (

{ingredient.name}

Found in:

{ingredient.found}

Why avoid:

{ingredient.why}

Natural alternative:

{ingredient.natural_alternative}

))}
{/* DIY Beauty Section */}

DIY Beauty Tips

General Guidelines

  • Always do a patch test before trying new ingredients
  • Use fresh, organic ingredients when possible
  • Store preparations properly and use within recommended time
  • Maintain cleanliness while preparing and applying

Best Practices

  • Follow seasonal skincare routines (Ritucharya)
  • Consider your skin/hair type and dosha
  • Maintain consistency in care routine
  • Complement external care with proper diet and lifestyle
); }; export default SkinHairCare;
